thread.title: Vantage Acceptance Helps Veterans with Donation to Warrior Angels Foundation
thread.title_full: Vantage Acceptance Helps Veterans with Donation to Warrior Angels Foundation - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Vantage Acceptance Helps Veterans with Donation to Warrior Angels Foundation
text:
Vantage Acceptance
WOODLAND HILLS, Calif. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Every year, Vantage Acceptance finds a way to help those in need and give back to their community. This year, Vantage Acceptance has chosen to give a charitable donation to the Warrior Angels Foundation .
The donation of $1,000 goes toward providing much needed medical assistance to veterans who are in desperate need of treatment. The foundation is well on their way to reaching their $2 million dollar goal this year. Raising this amount of money would provide a full year of laboratory evaluations and treatment to 400 veterans.
In prior years, Vantage Acceptance has donated to the Walk for Cancer which aims to raise awareness and funds in order to find treatments for various types of cancer.
Vantage Acceptance is a debt resolution and debt settlement company that helps people struggling with making monthly payments on their debt. Unsecured debts such as credit card debt, medical bills, personal loans, or deficiency balance from repossession, are just some of the types of debt that Vantage Acceptance will work to reach a settlement on for their clients.
The company aims to help people avoid filing bankruptcy and provides financial advice to get people's financial lives back on track. Vantage Acceptance provides free Quote: s and consultations to anyone interested in their services.
Warrior Angels is a non-profit organization (EIN 472642808) that provides medicine and medical care to U.S. Service Members and Veterans who have suffered a traumatic brain injury. The foundation works with donations provided in order to help veterans without them ever having to leave their homes.
The foundation aims not only to raise awareness but also solve ongoing problems with the medical care that is given to service members.
For more information contact: Woodland Hills, California based Vantage Acceptance today at: http://vantageacceptance.com/
Contact:
Maria Johnson,Marketing
Vantage Acceptance
Contact@vantageacceptance.com
